@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Mod Dcrew, post:16, topic:278193”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=367176.msg3162430#msg3162430 date=1269704464]

I added it, Put “add model 11021” it said it added i put the cb lvl 35 and npc id to 8020 btw and went in-game and type “::npc 8020” then it came with a message “Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1” what am i doing wrong?

(First time use of client-model adding and things i mostly code servers)

2 things
1.don’t gravedig
2.post in the help section here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,148.0.html
[/quote]

2 things
1] I SEARCHED FOR THIS
2] SHUTUP NOOB[/quote]
Telling me to shutup over telling you to post in the right fucking section?
This is why this community sucks. It’s filled with fucking idiots.

item.title: Summoning npcs part 1 (release+ints)
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

gary1988:

ive added animation to them, unless someone comes up with a way to get full animation, there will always be glitchyness thats the only thing that sucks but meh better to have them then not to D:

I know the way, unbelievably, you animate using the ints.

An example, of a cow.

--- --- NPC: 81 --- ---

item.title: Summoning npcs part 1 (release+ints)
item.dc:creator: @gary1988 gary1988
item.description:
@gary1988 wrote:

ok guys this is part 1 of my summoning npc release, more coming tonight ;), some npcs here ive seen in r.s some i havent but meh, there cool either way, also the summon option on these wont attack the npc (and ive fixed my pickupstixx npc too, if u need the new ints message me)

ok heres some piccys,


















[IMG]
(more coming in part 2 tonight hopefully)

ints

if(i == ****) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5]; class5.aStringArray66[0] = "Attack"; class5.anIntArray94 = new int[1]; class5.anIntArray94[0] = 11021; class5.aString65 = "your npcname here"; class5.anInt61 = **;/put ur combat lvl here class5.aByteArray89 = "another model brought to you by garyking".getBytes(); } if(i == ****) { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; DOWNLOAD LINK
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=H02U4BTL

the ints go in ur class5.java, and dont forget to type “add model ****” for all the models in game or they wont work

these models SHOULD be animated, but if there not then please report it to me so i can editt them, along with any other errors please let me know and ill fix asap,

these models are gzipped and ready to add

part 2 of these will be released within the next hour

Gary
